headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Subject of Netflix Series Appeals His Murder Conviction
headline.main: Wisconsin: Subject of Netflix Series Appeals His Murder Conviction

snippet: A convicted killer who is the subject of “Making a Murderer” filed a wide-ranging appeal claiming that the authorities used an improper warrant, among other things.
lead_paragraph: A convicted killer who is the subject of “Making a Murderer” filed a wide-ranging appeal claiming that the authorities used an improper warrant, among other things.
